data.title: Cool Place
data.text: The atmosphere of the place is neat because it is in the basement of the building. The bartender was great and the drinks were very reasonable.

data.title: Best little bar in downtown Huntsville
data.text: Pay no attention to the older reviews. Voodoo is now smoke free. Great music, even better staff and a second to none atmosphere. Anytime I'm downtown, Voodoo is a must.

data.title: Home Away from Home
data.text: Voodoo Lounge is a smokeless dive in bar. This place is a hidden gem. The atmosphere is very laid back and feels like home away from home. The bartenders that I have encountered there are top notch and make the Voodoo experience that much more entertaining. I suggest getting the Pink Chicken if you like cocktails. The food is scrumptious and reasonably priced. The live music is worth checking out, especially if Local Orbit is in the house.

data.title: Karaoke nights turn up!!!
data.text: this is the place to be Sunday night's. always good music and karaoke! friendly staff, good food, always hav a good time when I go.

data.title: Best Bar Downtown!
data.text: Love this place. The bartenders are personable, the drinks are amazing, and there's always live music going on. It's a great bar with a cool vibe.

data.title: Great place for music and now smoke free!
data.text: Voodoo went non-smoking!  It has a cool atmosphere, friendly staff and is a great place to hear fabulous local music!  The food is "bar food", and a great version of that!  It is a must-see for visitors and locals!

data.title: It's a bar w/ live music and karaoke
data.text:
yes, VDL is smoky. It has a low (I recall the ceiling had beautiful details in it) ceiling and is long and narrow in layout. You step down from the "North Side of the Square" to enter VDL. If I've eaten here, it would be because nothing else was open at last call, ha ha! So, whatever food we've had here would have been typical bar fare

So, go for a drink, if smoke doesn't bother you and you are not claustrophobic. They (at least used to) have dart boards at the end of the long bar on your way to the rest rooms.

It can get loud with the bands set up in the small corner where you enter. 

To their credit, I accidentally left my debit card there and there were no unexpected charges on it. Friends tell me their karaoke is not the "run of the mill" but more interesting/eclectic music.

owner_response.author: lasmith03, Owner at Voodoo Lounge Bar and Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: As of Jan. 1, 2014 the Voodoo Lounge is now a non-smoking bar inside with a smoking area outside out back. Also, just to avoid confusion, we are off the "South" side of the square not the "North".  Thanks for the review.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Smoky, dank
data.text: Walked in, which is really down under, and the bartender was smoking, along with half the patrons...I'll pass so left and found other locations.  Humprey's came highly recommended, but it was closed for construction.   Voodoos had a band setting up, but it the place is so small, it must be loud!

owner_response.author: lasmith03, Owner at Voodoo Lounge Bar and Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: As of Jan 1, 2014 the Voodoo Lounge is now non-smoking inside with a smoking area outside out back. Thanks for the review.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
